org_midgardproject_projectsite_project.title: The Midgard Project
org_midgardproject_projectsite_project.abstract: <div><p>Midgard is a <b>free software project</b> aiming to build <b>a content repository</b> useful for synchronized desktop, mobile and web applications. Since 1999, the project has been releasing both the content repository library itself, and also many useful tools around it, like <b>web frameworks</b> for PHP and Python.</p></div><div><p>The project is fully volunteer-driven, with individuals and multiple companies working together to build useful common infrastructure.</p></div>
org_midgardproject_projectsite_project.content: The Midgard Project is open for anybody to participate. Follow us <a href="https://twitter.com/MidgardProject">on Twitter</a>, or join the discussions <a href="http://www.qaiku.com/channels/show/midgard/">on Qaiku</a> and <a>Freenode #midgard</a> channel.
